name: playcanvas
description: JavaScript game engine built on WebGL and WebVR. https://playcanvas.com/

scripts.build: cd build && node build.js -l 1 -o output/playcanvas-latest.min.js && node build.js -l 0 -o output/playcanvas-latest.js && node build.js -l 0 -d -o output/playcanvas-latest.dbg.js

author: PlayCanvas <support@playcanvas.com>
